definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: But it had a nine million dollar surplus in cranberries.
sentences.chinese: 但却有九百万美元的蔓越橘的剩余。

sentences.english: Any of various New World shrubs of the genus Gaylussacia, related to the blueberries and bearing edible fruit.
sentences.chinese: 越橘美洲无芒药属灌木，与乌饭树有关，果实可食。

sentences.english: Bilberry has been used as a medicinal herb since the 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 自16世纪以来，越橘就广泛的应用于药物当中。

sentences.english: But it had a 9 million dollar surplus in cranberries .
sentences.chinese: 不过在蔓越橘上则有九百万美元的盈余。

sentences.english: The invention relates to an extraction of the idaein of camphor leaves and an application in healthy products.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是樟叶越橘苷的提取及其在健康产品中的应用。

sentences.english: Add cranberries and nuts, and remove from heat. Stir in curry powder.
sentences.chinese: 加入越橘和坚果烤杏仁，去火，加咖喱粉搅拌。

sentences.english: Found in blueberries and cranberries, anthocyanins have been shown to aid memory.
sentences.chinese: 已经指出蓝莓和蔓越橘中所含的花青素可以帮助记忆。

sentences.english: Our research is about blueberry leaf spot disease in Dalian, Liaoning province of China.
sentences.chinese: 本文对发生在辽东地区的越橘叶斑病进行了相关研究。

sentences.english: Spread half of the batter in prepared pan. Top with half of preserved cranberries , then half of the streusel mixture.
sentences.chinese: 一半面糊入模，铺上曼越橘，然后洒入一半脆皮料。

sentences.english: Mom had made huckleberry pie and offered Henry some.
sentences.chinese: 她回忆说，“妈会做越橘派并给亨利带上几个。”

sentences.english: But it had a nine million dollar  surplus in  cranberries.
sentences.chinese: 但是在曼越橘上有900万美金的顺差。

sentences.english: One of the best ways to treat a bladder infection such as cystitis is with cranberry concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 越橘浓缩物是治疗膀胱炎等疾病的一种灵丹妙药。
